Class GoldCoin

java.lang.Object
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.strategy.Gravity
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gameprops.GameProp
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gameprops.GoldCoin
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObject
public class GoldCoin extends GameProp
GoldCoin create by Boss when its dead. GoldCoin is able to pick up by Hero. GoldCoin falls onto the PlatformUnit or FloorUnit and will not disappear
Author:
YuyanZhou
